text: Making the Buttermilk from Curd Make buttermilk from curd using a blender. To make it less thick, add 1/2 a liter of water. Add salt.  Add turmeric powder.  Blend these ingredients together. Once blended, pour the contents from the blender into a mixing bowl. Creating the Paste Soak the red chilies, mustard seeds, cumin seeds, coriander seeds, Bengal gram lentils, ginger and coconut in water. Soak for 1 hour. Blend the soaked ingredients together after 1 hour. To help blend properly, you may need to add a little more water. Add the resulting paste into the prepared buttermilk.  Mix the paste and buttermilk together.  Cooking the Andhra Mazziga Pulusu Add the chopped spinach leaves.  Mix well.  Cook the dish for few minutes.  Add the chopped tomatoes and green chilies.  Mix well.  Add seasoning and asafoetida powder.  Mix well. Serve with rice.
